subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_021C_01C9E846.BC5A9EA0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="utf-8"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Thanks Lizzie!

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Lizzie Broden 
  To=
: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 2:31 PM
  Subject:=
 Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas






  This might clear a few misconceptions up. =
  It is a very broad spectrum and includes radio waves.

  http://en.wikipe=
dia.org/wiki/Electromagnetic_spectrum
   
  "Nature is showing us only the =
tail of the lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs to it even thou=
gh, because of its large size, it cannot totally reveal itself all at once.=
" 
  -=E2=80=94 Albert Einstein 



  "It is far better to grasp the univer=
se as it really is than to persist in delusions, however satisfying and rea=
ssuring."
  --Carl Sagan



  "There is no such thing as an insignificant d=
etail. Don't just look 
  for what you want to find."
  -- Me LOL 





---=
---------------------------------------------------------------------------=

  From: April Abercrombie <april@...>
  To: EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Monday, June 8, 2009 3:21:23 PM
  Subject: Re: [=
EVP-ITC] New ideas



  This seems to jive with what I have learned this fa=
r, but I am still not certain I understand it completely.

  I thought ever=
ything was based in the electromagnetic spectrum.

  ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
    From: Frank Ratka 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
    Sent: =
Monday, June 08, 2009 2:05 PM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas


      =
    Tell me where the seperation on the spectrum takes place between 300Hz =
and 300KHz. Yes, soundwaves cause pressure waves that our ears read as vibr=
ation and our mind translates as sound. The waves are still on the electrom=
agnetic spectrum. Even subsonic geomagnetic waves are present on the scale.=
 What I mean by power can be directll translated to volume or amplitude. Th=
e only thing that distinguishes soundwaves from any other wave is the fact =
that we can hear them.

          Frank R.

          --- On Mon, 6/8/09, R=
j <rasterer@yahoo. com> wrote:


            From: Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com>=

            Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
            To: EVP-ITC@yahoo=
groups .com
            Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 2:53 PM


             =
     No. Sounds waves are not on the electromagnet spectrum nor are they a =
form of electromagnet energy. Sound waves are based on pressure waves in th=
e air (or in other substances).  Our ears detect these pressure waves and t=
ranslate them into sounds we here.  Our ear do NOT hear electromagnet energ=
y.  Our eyes do: that part which we call visible light.



                =
  --- On Mon, 6/8/09, Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com> wrote:


      =
              From: Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com>
                 =
   Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
                    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogr=
oups .com
                    Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 12:38 PM


      =
                    It sounds like she's saying "one, two, ....."

        =
                  A mistake that a lot of people make is thinking that ther=
e are two different types of energy at work when it comes to sound waves an=
d electromagnetic waves. The only thing that seperates them is frequency an=
d power. Radio waves are radio waves because they occupy a certain block of=
 the electromagnietic spectrum. Sound waves exist on that same spectrum jus=
t farther down with much longer waves. Soundwaves and subsonic waves can pe=
netrate almost anything because of their wavelengths. The shorter the wavel=
ength the more ways we can shield against them.

                          =
Think of microwaves. These are also a type of radio and telemetry transmitt=
ing wave but the waves also have a physical effect on our environment by ca=
using molecules to speed up, which creates heat. A little lower than this i=
s IR or infrared it too can cause physical objects to heat up but usually i=
t just causes molecules to rotate in place. All physical things give off IR=
 light. Its a way the total system conserves energy by spontaneously emitti=
ng IR radiation.

                          Frank R.

                     =
     --- On Mon, 6/8/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch=
. com> wrote:


                            From: April Abercrombie <april@=
abercrombiegh ostresearch. com>
                            Subject: Re: [E=
VP-ITC] New ideas [3 Attachments]
                            To: EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups .com
                            Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 2:2=
7 PM


                            Here is some food for thought. I am curr=
ently reviewing my audio from our May 30th investigation.

                =
            It was me and another girl teammate present in the room. I pick=
ed up a 3rd female voice on my digital voice recorder that I carry with me.=
 We were standing right next to another digital video recorder that I leave=
 beside my night vision camera. That recorder did not pick up this 3rd voic=
e. I have asked the girl that was with me to check her recording to see if =
she picked it up.

                            I have long felt the true EV=
P does not come from sound waves in the environment, or then it wouldn't be=
 EVP, but a disembodied voice. Somehow EVP's are appearing directly on the =
recordings.

                            This instance with the recorders m=
ay back that theory up. That other recorder should have picked that voice u=
p if it were sound waves in the environment.

                            I=
 am attaching the clip of this 3rd voice. The file that is named "01-02-17 =
Clip" is the full clip. You will hear my voice as I say "Yeah", and then an=
other comes in right after that. I think I know what it says.

            =
                Again, I was live monitoring my audio, but still did not he=
ar this until playback. It isn't clear, so I am not as excited about it as =
my one's from the last investigation.


                              -----=
 Original Message ----- 
                              From: Frank Ratka 
 =
                             To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
                =
              Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 1:09 PM
                         =
     Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas


                                I h=
ave a running theory that EVP is carried on an untrasonic wave and demodula=
ted exactly where they want it to manifest. It works off the heterodyne pri=
nciple. If you mix two ultrasonic waves that differ one another in frequenc=
y then if you add or subtract them together you get a beat frequency or alt=
ernate frequency. For example, if a ghost is sending a signal at 54KHz and =
you have an electric fan in a room creating an untrasonic frequency at 45KH=
z then you will have a intermediate difference frequency at 9KHz, well with=
in human hearing range (20Hz to 20KHz). This was just an example, but all e=
lectronic equipment generates ultrasonic signals just by turning them on. F=
rom this theory I always felt that EVP were generated within a few inches o=
f the recorder.

                                We are able to reproduce t=
his affect in not only radio with superheterodyne systems but also with aco=
ustics and audio as in some passive sonars and a commercial produce called =
the "audio spotlight" by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.

                             =
   Frank R.

                                --- On Mon, 6/8/09, Zack Widup=
 <w9sz.zack@gmail. com> wrote:


                                From: Zack=
 Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com>
                                Subject: Re: =
[EVP-ITC] New ideas
                                To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups=
 .com
                                Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 1:56 PM

=

                                Fascinating! I've had this idea that the E=
VP are often not recorded by the microphone but somehow make their way in a=
t the actual point where the storage is made, whether it be analog (tape) o=
r digital. 

                                So much we don't know ...

   =
                             Zack

                                 
      =
                          On Mon, Jun 8, 2009 at 1:39 PM, April Abercrombie=
 <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:




                        =
        I monitor my audio live. The funny thing is that even so, those las=
t EVP's I captured I did not hear either in the environment, or on my recor=
ding as it happened. I only heard them upon playback.

                    =
            ----- Original Message ----- 
                                F=
rom: Zack Widup 
                                To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .c=
om 
                                Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 11:40 AM
  =
                              Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas


          =
                      I am curious if anyone with a microphone wired to a r=
emote site has ever gotten any EVP in real time.

                         =
       I took part in an investigation of Ashmore Estates, near Ashmore IL,=
 on Saturday night. We had six video cameras set up in the three halls of t=
he building. The video for all was being monitored and recorded at a centra=
l location. Alas, we did not have microphones at the camera sites conected =
to the central location. I wonder what we might have heard if we did?

    =
                            Zack

                                 
       =
                         On Mon, Jun 8, 2009 at 12:05 PM, threadsintyme@ ju=
no.com <Threadsintyme@ juno.com> wrote:


                                L=
et's just agree to end this discussion about her... 
                      =
          Why don't we discuss something on a lighter note? Anyone have any=
 new ideas about either evp or ITC? 
                                Al

  =
                               

                         

               =

       on an untrasonic wave and demodulated exactly 
                     =
           where they want it to manifest. It works off the 
              =
                  heterodyne principle. If you mix two ultrasonic 
        =
                        waves that differ one another in frequency then 
  =
                              if you add or subtract them together you get =
a 
                                beat frequency or alternate frequency. F=
or 
                                example, if a ghost is sending a signal=
 at 54KHz 
                                and you have an electric fan in =
a room creating 
                                an untrasonic frequency at=
 45KHz then you will 
                                have a intermediate d=
ifference frequency at 
                                9KHz, well wit=
hin human hearing range (20Hz to 
                                20KHz). T=
his was just an example, but all 
                                electroni=
c equipment generates ultrasonic 
                                signals j=
ust by turning them on. From this 
                                theory I=
 always felt that EVP were generated 
                                withi=
n a few inches of the recorder.</DIV>
                                <DIV>=
 </DIV>
                                <DIV>We are able to reproduce =
this affect in not 
                                only radio with superhe=
terodyne systems but also 
                                with acoustics a=
nd audio as in some passive 
                                sonars and a c=
ommercial produce called the 
                                "audio spotli=
ght" by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.</DIV>
                                <DIV>&nbs=
p;</DIV>
